channel.title: Certificates on Ameer Taweel
channel.description: Recent content in Certificates on Ameer Taweel

item.title: Deep Learning Specialization
item.description: I started taking the Deep Learning Specialization offered by DeepLearnin.AI on Coursera. The specialization consists of five courses: Neural Networks and Deep Learning Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization Structuring Machine Learning Projects Convolutional Neural Networks Sequence Models I have completed the first course of the specialization successfully: View Course 1 Certificate I started taking the second course of the specialization.

item.title: Game Development With Unity3D
item.description: I started taking the Game Development With Unity3D Specialization offered by Michigan State University on Coursera. The specialization consists of five courses: Build a 2D Shooter Build a 2D Platformer Build a 3D Shooter Build a 3D Platformer Captsone Project I have completed the first two course so far: View Course 1 Certificate View Course 2 Certificate I started taking the third course.

item.title: Blockchain Specialization
item.description: I started taking the Blockchain Specialization offered by University at Buffalo on Coursera. The specialization consists of four courses: Blockchain Basics Smart Contracts Decentralized Applications (Dapps) Blockchain Platforms I have completed all the four courses of the specialization successfully. View Course 1 Certificate View Course 2 Certificate View Course 3 Certificate View Course 4 Certificate Also, you can view the specialization’s certificate here.
